mapper.insert: insert into vertical_portfolio_article (id_vertical_portfolio, id_vertical_article, sort_no) values (#{idPortfolio}, #{idArticle}, #{maxSortNo})
mapper.update: update vertical_portfolio_article set sort_no = #{sortNo} where id_vertical_portfolio = #{idPortfolio} and id_vertical_article = #{idArticle}
mapper.delete: delete from vertical_portfolio_article where id_vertical_portfolio = #{idPortfolio} and id_vertical_article = #{idArticle}
mapper.select: select id, portfolio_head_img_url, portfolio_title, portfolio_author_id, portfolio_description, updated_time from vertical_portfolio where portfolio_author_id = #{idUser}

select id, portfolio_head_img_url, portfolio_title, portfolio_author_id,
portfolio_description_html as portfolio_description,
portfolio_description,
updated_time from vertical_portfolio where id = #{id}
select count(*) from vertical_portfolio_article where id_vertical_portfolio = #{idPortfolio}
select count(*) from vertical_portfolio_article where id_vertical_portfolio = #{idPortfolio} and id_vertical_article = #{idArticle}
select ifnull(max(sort_no),0) + 1 from vertical_portfolio_article where id_vertical_portfolio = #{idPortfolio}
